teal.render.j3d

Interface ShapeNode3D

  • All Superinterfaces:
    HasColor
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ArrowNode, GridNode, HelixNode, ImageNode, LineNode, RectangleNode, ShapeNode, SolidArrowNode, SphereNode, StemNode

    public interface ShapeNode3D
extends HasColor
    provides SceneGraphNode for the management of a single Element which contains at most one Shape3D and provides access to the shape's methods. May want to support multiple shapes, but use multiple geometries for now.
    Version:
    $Revision: 1.18 $
    Author:
    Phil Bailey
